verses.verse: (For the choir director; according to <S%H7799>Shoshannim.<s%> [A Psalm] of David.) <S%H3467>Save<s%> me, O <S%H430>God,<s%> For the <S%H4325>waters<s%> have <S%H935>threatened<s%> <S%H5704><s%> my <S%H5315>life.<s%>

I have <S%H2883>sunk<s%> in <S%H4688>deep<s%> <S%H3121>mire,<s%> and <S%H369>there<s%> is <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H4613>foothold;<s%> I have <S%H935>come<s%> into <S%H4615>deep<s%> <S%H4325>waters,<s%> and a <S%H9578>flood<s%> <S%H7857>overflows<s%> me.
I am <S%H3021>weary<s%> with my <S%H7121>crying;<s%> my <S%H1627>throat<s%> is <S%H2787>parched;<s%> My <S%H5869>eyes<s%> <S%H3615>fail<s%> while I <S%H3176>wait<s%> for my <S%H430>God.<s%>

Those who <S%H8130>hate<s%> me <S%H2600>without<s%> a <S%H2600>cause<s%> are <S%H7231>more<s%> <S%H4480>than<s%> the <S%H8185>hairs<s%> of my <S%H7218>head;<s%> Those who would <S%H6789>destroy<s%> me are <S%H6105>powerful,<s%> being <S%H8267>wrongfully<s%> my <S%H340>enemies,<s%> <S%H834>What<s%> I did not <S%H1497>steal,<s%> I <S%H227>then<s%> have to <S%H7725>restore.<s%>
O <S%H430>God,<s%> it is Thou who dost <S%H3045>know<s%> my <S%H200>folly,<s%> And my <S%H819>wrongs<s%> are not <S%H3582>hidden<s%> from Thee.

May those who <S%H6960>wait<s%> for Thee not be <S%H954>ashamed<s%> through me, O <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3068>God<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts;<s%> May those who <S%H1245>seek<s%> Thee not be <S%H3637>dishonored<s%> through me, O <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%>
<S%H3588>Because<s%> for Thy <S%H5921>sake<s%> I have <S%H5375>borne<s%> <S%H2781>reproach;<s%> <S%H3639>Dishonor<s%> has <S%H3680>covered<s%> my <S%H6440>face.<s%>
I <S%H1961>have<s%> <S%H1961>become<s%> <S%H2114>estranged<s%> from my <S%H251>brothers,<s%> And an <S%H5237>alien<s%> to my mother's <S%H1121>sons.<s%>
For <S%H7068>zeal<s%> for Thy <S%H1004>house<s%> has <S%H398>consumed<s%> me, And the <S%H2781>reproaches<s%> of those who <S%H2778>reproach<s%> Thee have <S%H5307>fallen<s%> on me.
When I <S%H1058>wept<s%> in my <S%H5315>soul<s%> with <S%H6685>fasting,<s%> It <S%H1961>became<s%> my <S%H2781>reproach.<s%>
When I <S%H5414>made<s%> <S%H8242>sackcloth<s%> my <S%H3830>clothing,<s%> I <S%H1961>became<s%> a <S%H4912>byword<s%> to them.
Those who <S%H3427>sit<s%> in the <S%H8179>gate<s%> <S%H7878>talk<s%> about me, And I [am] the <S%H5058>song<s%> of the <S%H7941>drunkards.<s%> <S%H8354><s%>

But as for me, my <S%H8605>prayer<s%> is to Thee, O <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> at an <S%H7522>acceptable<s%> <S%H6256>time;<s%> O <S%H430>God,<s%> in the <S%H7230>greatness<s%> of Thy <S%H2617>lovingkindness,<s%> <S%H6030>Answer<s%> me with Thy <S%H3468>saving<s%> <S%H571>truth.<s%>
<S%H5337>Deliver<s%> me from the <S%H2916>mire,<s%> and do not let me <S%H2883>sink;<s%> May I be <S%H5337>delivered<s%> from my <S%H8130>foes,<s%> and from the <S%H4615>deep<s%> <S%H4325>waters.<s%>

May the <S%H9578>flood<s%> of <S%H4325>water<s%> not <S%H7857>overflow<s%> me, And may the <S%H4688>deep<s%> not <S%H1104>swallow<s%> me up, And may the <S%H875>pit<s%> not <S%H332>shut<s%> its <S%H6310>mouth<s%> on me.
<S%H6030>Answer<s%> me, O <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> for Thy <S%H2617>lovingkindness<s%> is <S%H2896>good;<s%> According to the <S%H7230>greatness<s%> of Thy <S%H7356>compassion,<s%> <S%H6437>turn<s%> to me,
And do not <S%H5641>hide<s%> Thy <S%H6440>face<s%> from Thy <S%H5650>servant,<s%> For I am in <S%H9503>distress;<s%> <S%H6030>answer<s%> me <S%H4118>quickly.<s%>
Oh <S%H7126>draw<s%> <S%H7126>near<s%> to my <S%H5315>soul<s%> [and] <S%H1350>redeem<s%> it; <S%H6299>Ransom<s%> me <S%H4616>because<s%> of my <S%H340>enemies!<s%>
Thou dost <S%H3045>know<s%> my <S%H2781>reproach<s%> and my <S%H1322>shame<s%> and my <S%H3639>dishonor;<s%> <S%H3605>All<s%> my <S%H6887>adversaries<s%> are <S%H5048>before<s%> Thee.

<S%H2781>Reproach<s%> has <S%H7665>broken<s%> my <S%H3820>heart,<s%> and I am so <S%H5136>sick.<s%> And I <S%H6960>looked<s%> for <S%H5110>sympathy,<s%> but <S%H369>there<s%> was <S%H369>none,<s%> And for <S%H5162>comforters,<s%> but I <S%H4672>found<s%> <S%H3808>none.<s%>
They also <S%H5414>gave<s%> me <S%H7219>gall<s%> for my <S%H1267>food,<s%> And for my <S%H6772>thirst<s%> they <S%H8248>gave<s%> me <S%H2558>vinegar<s%> to <S%H8248>drink.<s%>
May their <S%H7979>table<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> them <S%H1961>become<s%> a <S%H4170>snare;<s%> And when they are in <S%H7965>peace,<s%> [may it become] a <S%H4170>trap.<s%>

May their <S%H5869>eyes<s%> <S%H2821>grow<s%> <S%H2821>dim<s%> <S%H4480>so<s%> that they <S%H4480>cannot<s%> <S%H7200>see,<s%> And make their <S%H4975>loins<s%> <S%H4571>shake<s%> <S%H8548>continually.<s%>
<S%H8210>Pour<s%> out Thine <S%H2195>indignation<s%> on them, And may Thy <S%H2740>burning<s%> <S%H639>anger<s%> <S%H5381>overtake<s%> them.
May their <S%H2918>camp<s%> be <S%H8074>desolate;<s%> May <S%H408>none<s%> <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in their <S%H168>tents.<s%>

For they have <S%H7291>persecuted<s%> him <S%H834>whom<s%> Thou <S%H859>Thyself<s%> hast <S%H5221>smitten,<s%> And they <S%H5608>tell<s%> of the <S%H4341>pain<s%> of those whom Thou hast <S%H2491>wounded.<s%>
Do Thou <S%H5414>add<s%> <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> to their <S%H5771>iniquity,<s%> And may they not <S%H935>come<s%> into Thy <S%H6666>righteousness.<s%>
May they be <S%H4229>blotted<s%> out of the <S%H5612>book<s%> of <S%H2416>life,<s%> And may they not be <S%H3789>recorded<s%> with the <S%H6662>righteous.<s%>
But I am <S%H6041>afflicted<s%> and in <S%H3510>pain;<s%> May Thy <S%H3444>salvation,<s%> O <S%H430>God,<s%> <S%H7682>set<s%> me [securely] on <S%H7682>high.<s%>
I will <S%H1984>praise<s%> the <S%H8034>name<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> with <S%H7892>song,<s%> And shall <S%H1431>magnify<s%> Him with <S%H8426>thanksgiving.<s%>

And it will <S%H3190>please<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H3190>better<s%> <S%H4480>than<s%> an <S%H7794>ox<s%> [Or] a <S%H6499>young<s%> <S%H6499>bull<s%> with <S%H7161>horns<s%> and <S%H6536>hoofs.<s%>
The <S%H6035>humble<s%> have <S%H7200>seen<s%> [it and] are <S%H8055>glad;<s%> You who <S%H1875>seek<s%> <S%H430>God,<s%> let your <S%H3824>heart<s%> <S%H2421>revive.<s%>
For the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H8085>hears<s%> the <S%H34>needy,<s%> And does not <S%H959>despise<s%> His [who are] <S%H615>prisoners.<s%>
Let <S%H8064>heaven<s%> and <S%H776>earth<s%> <S%H1984>praise<s%> Him, The <S%H3220>seas<s%> and <S%H3605>everything<s%> that <S%H7430>moves<s%> in them.

For <S%H430>God<s%> will <S%H3467>save<s%> <S%H6726>Zion<s%> and <S%H1129>build<s%> the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> That they may <S%H3427>dwell<s%> <S%H8033>there<s%> and <S%H3423>possess<s%> it.
And the <S%H2233>descendants<s%> of His <S%H5650>servants<s%> will <S%H5157>inherit<s%> it, And those who <S%H157>love<s%> His <S%H8034>name<s%> will <S%H7931>dwell<s%> in it.
